allowEmptyInput.description: The executor exits without throwing an error when 'lintFilePatterns' match no files.

cache.description: Store the results of processed files so that Stylelint only operates on the changed ones.

cacheLocation.description: Path to a file or directory for the cache location.

configFile.description: Path of the stylelint configuration file.

fix.description: Fixes linting errors (may overwrite linted files).

force.description: Succeeds even if there were linting errors.

ignorePath.description: A path to a file containing patterns describing files to ignore.

lintFilePatterns.description: One or more files/dirs/globs to pass directly to Stylelint's lint() method.

maxWarnings.description: Number of warnings to trigger nonzero exit code.

quiet.description: Only register problems for rules with an "error"-level severity (ignore "warning"-level).

reportDescriptionlessDisables.description: Report stylelint-disable comments without a description.

reportInvalidScopeDisables.description: Report stylelint-disable comments that don't match rules that are specified in the configuration object.

reportNeedlessDisables.description: Report stylelint-disable comments that don't actually match any lints that need to be disabled.
